action_title: Pest regulation: Use organic fertilizer instead of inorganic

Pest numbers (2 studies): One replicated, randomized, controlled study from the USAÂ found more aphids in plots with organic fertilizer, compared to inorganic fertilizer, in some comparisons, but another one found similar numbers of aphids in the same study system.
